opis: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

naslov: Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages
opis: The story of a poor young woman, separated by prejudice from her husband and baby, is interwoven with tales of intolerance from throughout history.

naslov: Broken Blossoms or The Yellow Man and the Girl
opis: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.
Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.
The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.
On New Year's Eve, the driver of a ghostly carriage forces a drunken man to reflect on his selfish, wasted life.
Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.
A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.

A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.
An aging doorman is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbors and society after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious hotel.
Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.
A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.
A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.
The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.
A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.
A man learns he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7 p.m. that same day.
The demon Mephisto wagers with God that he can corrupt a mortal man's soul.

naslov: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
opis: A landlady suspects her new lodger is the madman killing women in London.

In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.
When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.
The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.
An allegorical tale about a man fighting the good and evil within him. Both sides are made flesh - one a sophisticated woman he is attracted to and the other his wife.
Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.
The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.
Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.
The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.
In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.
The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.
After killing a man in self-defense, a young woman is blackmailed by a witness to the killing.

naslov: All Quiet on the Western Front
opis: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.
Mayhem and zaniness ensue when a valuable painting goes missing during a party in honor of famed African explorer Captain Spaulding.
An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.
A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

A surrealist tale of a man and a woman who are passionately in love with each other, but their attempts to consummate that passion are constantly thwarted by their families, the Church, and bourgeois society.
With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.
After a naive real estate agent succumbs to the will of Count Dracula, the two head to London where the vampire sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.
Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.
When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.
On a transatlantic crossing, The Marx Brothers get up to their usual antics and manage to annoy just about everyone on board the ship.
A young hoodlum rises up through the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a bloody mob war.
Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.
A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.
A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.
Quincy Adams Wagstaff, the new president of Huxley University, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against the rival Darwin University.

naslov: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
opis: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves in the intolerable conditions of a southern chain gang, which later comes back to haunt him.
An insane hunter arranges for a ship to be wrecked on an island where he can indulge in some sort of hunting and killing of the passengers.
An Egyptian mummy searches Cairo for the girl he thinks is his long-lost princess.
Seeking shelter from a storm, five travelers are in for a bizarre and terrifying night when they stumble upon the Femm family estate.

naslov: Scarface: The Shame of the Nation
opis: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.
A criminal mastermind uses hypnosis to rule the rackets after death.
A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.
A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.
A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.
Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.
When the leading lady of a Broadway musical breaks her ankle, she is replaced by a young unknown actress, who becomes the star of the show.
A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.
A mad doctor conducts ghastly genetic experiments on a remote island in the South Seas, much to the fear and disgust of the shipwrecked sailor who finds himself trapped there.

A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal ape who takes a shine to their female blonde star. He is then captured and brought back to New York City for public exhibition.
When Stan and Ollie trick their wives into thinking that they are taking a medicinal cruise while they're actually going to a convention, the wives find out the truth the hard way.

naslov: Atalanta ali trabakula, ki plove mimo
opis: Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.
American honeymooners in Hungary become trapped in the home of a Satan-worshiping priest when the bride is taken there for medical help following a road accident.
A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

naslov: The Man Who Knew Too Much
opis: An ordinary British couple vacationing in Switzerland suddenly find themselves embroiled in a case of international intrigue when their daughter is kidnapped by spies plotting a political assassination.
Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.
Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.
After being wrongly convicted as a traitor, Peter Blood, an English physician, is sent to exile in the British colonies of the Caribbean, where he becomes a pirate.
First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1788 mutiny.
A sly business manager and two wacky friends of two opera singers help them achieve success while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.
An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.
Nick investigates the case of a missing man and later a murder that is connected to Nora's family.
A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.
When a wrongly accused prisoner barely survives a lynch mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.
The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.
A simple small-town man inherits a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.
A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.
A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.
A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.
After three British Agents are assigned to assassinate a mysterious German spy during World War I, two of them become ambivalent when their duty to the mission conflicts with their consciences.

Roguish gambler/dancer "Lucky" Garnett is challenged by his fiance's father to come up with $25,000 to prove he's worthy of her hand. But after he falls in love with a dance instructor, Lucky'll do anything to keep from earning the bucks.

Cautionary tale features a fictionalized take on the use of marijuana. A trio of drug dealers lead innocent teenagers to become addicted to "reefer" cigarettes by holding wild parties with jazz music.
A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.
A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship gets picked up by a fishing boat, where he's made to earn his keep by joining the crew in their work.
A veterinarian posing as a doctor and a race-horse owner and his friends struggle to help keep a sanitarium open with the help of a misfit race-horse.
During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.
When a wise diplomat's plane crashes in the snows of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.
Missing for seven years and presumed dead, a woman returns home on the day of her husband's second marriage.
Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.
A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, and achieves them only with the help of an alcoholic leading man whose best days are behind him.
A man on the run from a murder charge enlists a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.
When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.
The story of how a great Russian prince led a ragtag army to battle an invading force of Teutonic Knights.
A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.
While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.
In 1850s Louisiana, a free-spirited Southern belle loses her fiancé due to her stubborn vanity and pride, and vows to win him back.
While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.
A phonetics and diction expert makes a bet that he can teach a cockney flower girl to speak proper English and pass as a lady in high society.
A military deserter finds love and trouble (and a small dog) in a smoky French port city.
A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.
A young socialite is diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor, and must decide whether or not she'll meet her final days with dignity.
Deputy sheriff Destry tames the town of Bottle Neck, including saloon singer Frenchy.
A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
An aged teacher and former headmaster of a boarding school recalls his career and his personal life over the decades.
In 19th century India, three British soldiers and a native waterbearer must stop a secret mass revival of the murderous Thuggee cult before it can rampage across the land.
Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson investigate the legend of a supernatural hound, a beast that may be stalking a young heir on the fog-shrouded moorland that makes up his estate.
In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.
In Cornwall, 1819, a young woman discovers she's living near a gang of criminals who arrange shipwrecks for profit.
A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.
A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.
At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win an important contract.
Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.
A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

Returning to the ancestral castle long after the death of the monster, the son of Dr. Frankenstein meets a mad shepherd who is hiding the comatose creature. To clear the family name, he revives the creature and tries to rehabilitate him.
A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.
A study of the lives and romantic entanglements of various interconnected women.
A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.
A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.
On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.
A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.
Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.
A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.
The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.
A young Spanish aristocrat must masquerade as a fop in order to maintain his secret identity of Zorro as he restores justice to early California.
When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.
A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.
A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for the attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills on the sword.
Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.
After being tricked and cast out of Bagdad by the evil Jaffar, King Ahmad joins forces with a thief named Abu to reclaim his throne, the city, and the Princess he loves.
During World War I, believing her fiance to be dead, a young ballerina loses her job and is forced to turn to prostitution.
A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to help bring down her mob boss lover.
Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.
Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.
Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.
After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.
At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.
A trio of classy card sharks targets the socially awkward heir to brewery millions for his money, until one of them falls in love with him.
The ruthless, moneyed Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.
A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.
A man needing money agrees to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a political movement begins.
A couple who have been married for three years are shocked to learn that their marriage is not legally valid.
A marksman is drafted in World War I and ends up becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.
A Hollywood director, John L Sullivan, sets out to experience life as a poor, homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.
A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.
Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.
The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.
A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not he should help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.
An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.
At an inn which is only open on holidays, a crooner and a hoofer vie for the affections of a beautiful up-and-coming performer.
The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.
A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.
A frumpy spinster blossoms under therapy and becomes an elegant, independent woman.
An inventor needs cash to develop his big idea. His wife, who loves him, decides to raise it for him by divorcing him and marrying a millionaire.
The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.
A young man accused of sabotage goes on the lam to prove his innocence.
An English Duke from 1876 is inadvertedly dragged to modern day New York where he falls for a plucky advertising executive.
When assassin Philip Raven shoots a blackmailer and his beautiful female companion dead, he is paid off in marked bills by his treasonous employer who is working with foreign spies.
During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.
Rival reporters Sam and Tess fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when Sam comes to resent Tess' hectic lifestyle.
The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.
A French village doctor becomes the target of poison-pen letters sent to village leaders, accusing him of affairs and practicing abortion.
During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.

The resurrected Wolf Man, seeking a cure for his malady, enlists the aid of a mad scientist, who claims he will not only rid the Wolf Man of his nocturnal metamorphosis, but also revive the frozen body of Frankenstein's inhuman creation.
An old roué arrives in Hades to review his life with Satan, who will rule on his eligibility to enter the Underworld.
A nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner, who has been acting strangely, on a Caribbean island.

naslov: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
opis: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.
When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local farmer, they become strongly divided over whether or not to lynch the men.
After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, during the Allied retreat in the Libyan desert, an American tank picks-up a motley group of survivors but they face advancing Germans and a lack of water.
A young girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.
The young wife of an aging priest falls in love with his son amidst the horror of a merciless witch hunt in 17th century Denmark.

A writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation when he decides to get married. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.
An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.

naslov: The Best Years of Our Lives
opis: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.
When young Father O'Malley arrives at St. Dominic's, old Father Fitzgibbon doesn't think much of the church's newest member.
After a harsh childhood, orphan Jane Eyre is hired by Edward Rochester, the brooding lord of a mysterious manor house, to care for his young daughter.
A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.
Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the U-boat men who sunk it.
In the year leading up to the 1904 St. Louis World's Fair, the four Smith daughters learn lessons of life and love, even as they prepare for a reluctant move to New York.
After being hired to find an ex-con's former girlfriend, Philip Marlowe is drawn into a deeply complex web of mystery and deceit.
During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.
A composer and his sister discover that the reason they are able to purchase a beautiful gothic seacoast mansion very cheaply is the house's unsavory past.
When a conservative middle-aged professor engages in a minor dalliance with a femme fatale, he is plunged into a nightmarish quicksand of blackmail and murder.
Two sailors, one naive, the other experienced in the ways of the world, a musical set in Los Angeles.

Seven guests, a newly hired secretary and two staff are gathered at a manor house on an isolated island by an unknown absentee host and are killed off one-by-one. They work together to determine who the killer is before it's too late.
A ruthless doctor and his young prize student find themselves continually harassed by their murderous supplier of illegal cadavers.
Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

Architect Walter Craig (Mervyn Johns) senses impending doom as his half-remembered recurring dream turns into reality. The guests at the country house encourage him to stay as they take turns telling supernatural tales.
Chance events trap hitch-hiker Al Roberts in a tightening net of film noir trouble.
The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan and the four men who love her.
A young Englishwoman goes to the Hebrides to marry her older, wealthier fiancé. When the weather keeps them separated on different islands, she begins to have second thoughts.
During the early part of his reign, Ivan the Terrible faces betrayal from the aristocracy and even his closest friends as he seeks to unite the Russian people.
A writer falls in love with a young socialite and they're soon married. But her obsessive love for him threatens to be the undoing of them both, and everyone else around them.
The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.
A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.
A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.
When a man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, her venal fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.
A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.
Donald receives his birthday gifts, which include traditional gifts and information about Brazil (hosted by Zé Carioca) and Mexico (by Panchito, a Mexican Charro Rooster).
A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.
Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.
Beautiful half-breed Pearl Chavez becomes the ward of her dead father's first love and finds herself torn between her sons, one good and the other bad.
A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.
A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.
An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.
Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

naslov: A Matter of Life and Death
opis: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court.
The Earps battle the Clantons at the OK Corral in Tombstone, Arizona.
A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?
A married woman and a drifter fall in love, then plot to murder her husband.
During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.
The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.
In 1916, a shadowy serial killer is targeting women with "afflictions"; one night during a thunderstorm, the mute Helen feels menaced.

naslov: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
opis: A man is reunited with his childhood friend and her husband, who believe he knows the truth about the death of her rich aunt years earlier.
An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.
A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, with screwball results.
A debonair angel comes to Earth to help an Episcopalian bishop and his wife in their quest to raise money for the new church.
A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.
At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.
A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try and prove his innocence.
A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.
A young German boy faces the problems of the tough life in the immediate post WWII Berlin.
In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.
When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.
A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.
A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses and duplicitous dames.
A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.
Three outlaws on the run find a dying woman in the desert who gives birth to a baby. The mother entrusts the care of the child to the three men.

naslov: Bud Abbott Lou Costello Meet Frankenstein
opis: The Wolf Man tries to warn a dimwitted porter that Dracula wants his brain for Frankenstein monster's body.
A magazine tycoon commits a murder and pins it on an innocent man, who then tries to solve the murder himself.
Chicago reporter P.J. McNeal re-opens a ten year old murder case.
A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new dance partner to make his former partner jealous and to prove he can make any partner a star.
A butler working in a foreign embassy in London falls under suspicion when his wife accidentally falls to her death, the only witness being an impressionable young boy.
At Fort Apache, an honorable and veteran war captain finds conflict when his regime is placed under the command of a young, glory hungry lieutenant colonel with no respect for the local Indian tribe.
Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former king.
A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.
In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.
Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.
A pianist about to flee from a duel receives a letter from a woman he cannot remember, who may hold the key to his downfall.

naslov: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
opis: A man and his wife decide they can afford to have a house in the country built to their specifications. It's a lot more trouble than they think.
A step-by-step look at a murder investigation on the streets of New York.
In Charles Dickens' classic tale, an orphan wends his way from cruel apprenticeship to den of thieves in search of a true home.
Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.
A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.
Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.
While on the telephone, an invalid woman overhears what she thinks is a murder plot and attempts to prevent it.
Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.
A drunken doctor with a hot temper and a violence-prone gangster with tuberculosis form a quicksilver bond.
Domestic and professional tensions mount when a husband and wife work as opposing lawyers in a case involving a woman who shot her husband.

naslov: The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad
opis: An animated adaptation of "The Wind in the Willows" followed by an adaptation of "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow".
The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his friends richer and retains power by dint of a populist appeal.
Noriko is twenty-seven years old and still living with her widowed father. Everybody tries to talk her into marrying, but Noriko wants to stay at home caring for her father.
An uncompromising, visionary architect struggles to maintain his integrity and individualism despite personal, professional and economic pressures to conform to popular standards.
A young naive woman falls for a handsome young man who her emotionally abusive father suspects is a fortune hunter.
A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.
A letter is addressed to three wives from their "best friend" Addie Ross, announcing that she is running away with one of their husbands - but she does not say which one.
During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.
Three sailors on a day of shore leave in New York City look for fun and romance before their twenty-four hours are up.
A poet in love with Death follows his unhappy wife into the underworld.

Haunted by personal demons, Marine Sgt. John Stryker is hated and feared by his men, who see him as a cold-hearted sadist. But when their boots hit the beaches, they begin to understand the reason for Stryker's rigid form of discipline.
Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending massive Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.
Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.
A hard-as-nails general takes over a bomber unit suffering from low morale and whips them into fighting shape.
A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.
A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.
A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.
A tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette, with unexpected results.
When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.
Frank Bigelow, told he's been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find out who killed him and why.
The father of a young woman deals with the emotional pain of her getting married, along with the financial and organizational trouble of arranging the wedding.
A well meaning crack shot husband is pressured by his beautiful marksman wife to go on an interstate robbery spree, where he finds out just how depraved and deadly she really is.
Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.
Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.
A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.
A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.
A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.
A group of juvenile delinquents live a violent and crime-filled life in the festering slums of Mexico City, and the morals of young Pedro are gradually corrupted and destroyed by the others.
The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.
A cavalry officer posted on the Rio Grande is confronted with murderous raiding Apaches, a son who's a risk-taking recruit and his wife from whom he has been separated for many years.
A struggling actress tries to help a friend prove his innocence when he's accused of murdering the husband of a high society entertainer.
A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.
Det. Sgt. Mark Dixon wants to be something his old man wasn't: a guy on the right side of the law. Will Dixon's vicious nature get the better of him?
The journey of a prized rifle from one ill-fated owner to another parallels a cowboy's search for a murderous fugitive.
In WWI Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.
Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.
Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

naslov: The Day the Earth Stood Still
opis: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.
A young French girl orphaned in a Nazi air attack is befriended by the son of a poor farmer, and together they try to come to terms with the realities of death.
A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.
Fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia and begins questioning the tyrannical leadership of the despot Emperor Nero.

Ebenezer Scrooge, a curmudgeonly, miserly businessman, has no time for sentimentality and largely views Christmas as a waste of time. However, this Christmas Eve he will be visited by three spirits who will show him the errors of his ways.
A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.
Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.
Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.
An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director and a writer to achieve success.
When a town boss confiscates homesteader's supplies after gold is discovered nearby, a tough cowboy risks his life to try and get it to them.
The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer are told against a background of circus spectacle.

A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up years ago, arrives on the noon train.
A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.
A knight seeks to free the captive King Richard (Norman Wooland) and put him back on the throne.
A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.
A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.

naslov: The Man in the White Suit
opis: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.
A chemist finds his personal and professional life turned upside down when one of his chimpanzees finds the fountain of youth.
A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two less-than-trustworthy strangers.
A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.
A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
An elderly man and his dog struggle to survive on his government pension in Rome.
The story of Mexican revolutionary Emiliano Zapata, who led a rebellion against the corrupt, oppressive dictatorship of president Porfirio Díaz in the early 20th century.
A pretentiously artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.
Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.
The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.
Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.
In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.
A psychiatrist tells the stories of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda) and a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).
Army dispatch rider Hondo Lane discovers a woman and young son living in the midst of warring Apaches and becomes their protector.
An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.
Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.
A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.
A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

When an aristocratic woman known only as "Madame de . . ." sells a pair of earrings given to her by her husband in order to pay some debts, she sets off a chain reaction of financial and carnal consequences that can end only in despair.
As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.
Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.
A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.
In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.
A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.
In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.
A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.
A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.
When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.
On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple. They meet and things happen...
An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.
A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.
Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation and accidentally, but good-naturedly, causes havoc.
An unhappily married couple attempts to find direction and insight while vacationing in Naples.
A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.
A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.
A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.
This is the life of a Hollywood movie star named Maria, as told by writer/director Harry et al, from being discovered in Madrid, Spain, until her funeral in Italy.
When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.
A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.
The story of how the British attacked German dams in World War II by using an ingenious technique to drop bombs where they would be most effective.
The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.
A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.
Biography of bandleader Glenn Miller from his beginnings to his death over the English Channel in December 1944.
American nuclear weapons testing results in the creation of a seemingly unstoppable, dinosaur-like beast.
After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.
An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.
A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

The titular river unites a farmer recently released from prison, his young son, and an ambitious saloon singer. In order to survive, each must be purged of anger, and each must learn to understand and care for the others.
A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.
In medieval Japan, a compassionate governor is sent into exile. His wife and children try to join him, but are separated, and the children grow up amid suffering and oppression.
In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.
A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.
A film star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career on a downward spiral.
A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.
The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.
Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.
During the Mexican Rebellion of 1866, an unsavory group of American adventurers are hired by the forces of Emporer Maximilian to escort a countess to Vera Cruz.
A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.
Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.
An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.
A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong as the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.
A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.
A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.
After losing big, an aging gambler decides to assemble a team to rob a casino.
Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.
Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...
A wilful young man contends against his brother for the attention of their religious father while reconnecting with his estranged mother and falling for his brother's girlfriend.
In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.
Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed-up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.
A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".
The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.
Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.
Newcomer Will Lockhart defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.

naslov: The Man with the Golden Arm
opis: A strung-out junkie deals with a demoralizing drug addiction while his crippled wife and card sharks pull him down.
A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.
A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.
In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.
Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.
Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.
Emotions are ignited amongst the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labour Day picnic.
A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.
When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.
In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.
A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.
A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

The trouble with Harry is that he is dead and, while no one really minds, everyone feels responsible. After Harry's body is found in the woods, several locals must determine not only how and why he was killed but what to do with the body.
Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the house of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises.
Following his father's death, a boy leaves home to study in Calcutta, while his mother must face a life alone.
A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.
A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight-year-old daughter is a heartless killer.
A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away against her will to get married and live on his ranch in Montana.
A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful King.
A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.
Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.
A spoiled heiress must choose among three suitors: her jazz musician ex-husband, a stuffy businessman, and an undercover tabloid reporter.
A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.
Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five man team to plan and execute a daring race-track robbery.
A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.
The life of brilliant but tortured artist Vincent van Gogh.
A tale of innocent American tourists in Morocco whose son's kidnapping sets off a twisting plot of international intrigue.
The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.
An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.
Moses, an Egyptian Prince, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

naslov: Un condamné à mort s'est échappé ou Le vent souffle où il veut
opis: A captured French Resistance fighter during WWII engineers a daunting escape from a Nazi prison in France.
Napoleon's (Herbert Lom's) tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.
Alcoholic playboy Kyle Hadley marries the woman secretly loved by his poor but hard-working best friend, who in turn is pursued by Kyle's nymphomaniac sister.
A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.
A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?
In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, always sticks to her own moral code.
British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.
Victor Frankenstein builds a creature and brings it to life, but it behaves not as he intended.
During World War II, an American destroyer meets a German U-Boat. Both captains are experts, and so begins a deadly game of cat-and-mouse.
An Arkansas drifter becomes an overnight media sensation. As he becomes drunk with fame and power, will he ever be exposed as the fraud he has become?
An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.
Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.
During World War II, an American marine and an Irish nun form an unlikely friendship after being stranded on a South Pacific island. They find comfort in one another as the two hope for a rescue.
When Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.
After serving time for manslaughter, young Vince Everett becomes a teenage rock star.
A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.
Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.
A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.
Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.
American professor John Holden arrives in London for a parapsychology conference, only to find himself investigating the mysterious actions of Devil-worshiper Julian Karswell.
A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.
After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.
A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.
After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.
Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.
A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.
In 1953, an innocent man named Christopher Emmanuel "Manny" Balestrero is arrested after being mistaken for an armed robber.
When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.
A traveling magician and his assistants are persecuted by authorities in Sweden of the 19th century. Their captures, however, didn't bring victory to those in power.
A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.
An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt. Conflict ensues when the executor of his father's estate objects to the aunt's lifestyle.
A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancée, so she enchants him to love her instead.
A New Englander arrives in the Old West, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.
An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

Brick Pollitt (Paul Newman), an alcoholic ex-football player, drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife, Maggie (Dame Elizabeth Taylor). His reunion with his father, Big Daddy (Burl Ives), who is dying of cancer, jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.
Two escaped convicts chained together, white and black, must learn to get along in order to elude capture.

Jonathan Harker begets the ire of Count Dracula after he accepts a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses, forcing his colleague Dr. Van Helsing to destroy the predatory villain when he targets Harker's loved ones.
A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.
Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship, but it may not stay platonic for long.
A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.
Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.
Accused barn burner and conman Ben Quick (Paul Newman) arrives in a small Mississippi town and quickly ingratiates himself with its richest family, the Varners.
On its maiden voyage in April 1912, the supposedly unsinkable RMS Titanic hits an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean.
Evil aliens attack Earth and set their terrible "Plan 9" into action. As the aliens resurrect the dead of the Earth, the lives of the living are in danger.
As WWII and the German occupation ends, the Polish resistance and the Russian forces turn on each other in an attempt to take over leadership in Communist Poland.
A U.S. sub commander, obsessed with sinking a certain Japanese ship, butts heads with his first officer and crew.
A motley quintet of inept small-time thieves attempt the burglary of a local pawnshop in this Italian farce.
On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.
A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.
A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.
A slave and a Viking prince fight for the love of a captive princess.
In a murder trial, the defendant says he suffered temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?
This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy follows Apu's life as an orphaned adult aspiring to be a writer.
Young Russian soldier Alyosha earns a medal, but asks to visit his mother instead. His journey recounts various kinds of love during wartime.
After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.
A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.
In 1863, a Union outfit is sent behind Confederate lines in Mississippi to destroy enemy railroads but a captive southern belle and the unit's doctor cause frictions within ranks.
When a nobleman is threatened by a family curse on his newly inherited estate, detective Sherlock Holmes is hired to investigate.
An aspiring white actress befriends an African American widow, but trouble arises when the latter is rejected by her daughter, who tries to pass for white.

naslov: Journey to the Center of the Earth
opis: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.
An impoverished backward nation declares a war on the United States of America, hoping to lose, but things don't go according to plan.
In 1895, British archaeologists find and open the tomb of Egyptian Princess Ananka with nefarious consequences.
A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.
After leaving a wealthy Belgian family to become a nun, Sister Luke struggles with her devotion to her vows during crisis, disappointment, and World War II.
Two boys begin a silence strike to press their parents into buying them a television set.
After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.
During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.
A retelling of the Orpheus and Eurydice myth, set during the time of the Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro.
Michel is released from jail after serving a sentence for thievery. His mother dies and he resorts to pickpocketing as a means of survival.
An interior decorator and a playboy songwriter share a telephone party line and size each other up.
A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.
A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.
Cassavetes' jazz-scored improvisational film explores interracial friendships and relationships in Beat-Era (1950s) New York City.
After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.
After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.
A surgeon is assigned the case of a young woman whose aunt wants her lobotomized to cover up a family secret.
A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured, and goes to extremes to give her a new face.

A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.
In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.
A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.
A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.
A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering paparazzo journalist living in Rome.
A fast-talking traveling salesman with a charming, loquacious manner convinces a sincere evangelist that he can be an effective preacher for her cause.
The state of Israel is created in 1948, resulting in war with its Arab neighbors.
Upon entering his fiancée's family mansion, a man discovers a savage family curse and fears that his future brother-in-law has entombed his bride-to-be prematurely.
Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.
An innocent yet pampered young virgin and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.
A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.
Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant, with only the girl's brother and a handsome doctor standing in her way.
A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.
Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.
A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.
Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.
A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.
A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
Having recently been uprooted to Milan, Rocco and his four brothers each look for a new way in life when a prostitute comes between Rocco and his brother Simone.
The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.
A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.
A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

Charlie is approached by his crook brother Chico, who is chased by two gangsters. Charlie helps him to escape, but he upsets the criminals, so when his brother Fido is kidnapped, Charlie has to take an attitude with tragic consequences.
In prison four long-sentence inmates planning an elaborate escape cautiously induct a new inmate to join in their scheme which leads to distrust and uncertainty.
In the English village of Midwich, the blonde-haired, glowing-eyed children of uncertain paternity prove to have frightening powers.
A vengeful young man marries the daughter of a corrupt industrialist in order to seek justice for his father's suicide.
In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.
A defecting Soviet scientist is hit by a nuclear explosion near Yucca Flats and roams around as a beast.
A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.
A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.
In the Italy of WWII, a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.

Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teamed with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves dealing with the Comanches known as Comancheros.
A burglar betraying other criminals, prepares for a big heist with a trusted friend that might be as untrustworthy as he.
The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz de Bivar (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.
A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.
An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.
A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.
In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.
Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.
A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.
When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.
In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.
After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.
Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.
In the sixteenth century, Francis Barnard travels to Spain to clarify the strange circumstances of his sister's death after she had married the son of a cruel Spanish Inquisitor.
A fragile Kansas girl's love for a handsome young man from the town's most powerful family drives her to heartbreak and madness.
Recently released from a mental hospital; Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family and their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.
A French striptease artist is desperate to become a mother. When her reluctant boyfriend suggests that his best friend impregnate her, feelings become complicated when she accepts.
Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.
Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.
A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.
A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.
A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.
After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.
Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.
An alcoholic marries a young woman, who he systematically addicts to booze, so they can share his "passion" together.
A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.
A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.
A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.
A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the nineteenth century - including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.
In WW2, twelve year old Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev works for the Soviet army as a scout behind the German lines and strikes a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers.

A newspaper and television station funded by a pharmaceutical company want a sensation, which happens to be the discovery of King Kong on an island. He is captured and brought to Japan, where he escapes from captivity and battles Godzilla.
The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.
A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a fourteen-year-old nymphet.

A juvenile offender (Sir Tom Courtenay) at a tough reform school impresses its Governor (Sir Michael Redgrave) with his running ability and is encouraged to compete in an upcoming race, but faces ridicule from his peers.
A fiercely independent cowboy gets himself locked up in prison to escape with an old friend.
The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

Having renounced her ignominious past, a former streetwalker reunites with her son. However, an extortion scheme endangers her aspirations for a decent bourgeois life. Can she protect him from the same snares that wounded her youth?

naslov: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
opis: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.
A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.
The story of Anne Sullivan's struggle to teach the blind and deaf Helen Keller how to communicate.
Harold Hill poses as a boys' band leader to con naive Iowa townsfolk.

In 1787, British ship Bounty leaves Portsmouth to bring a cargo of bread-fruit from Tahiti but the savage on-board conditions imposed by Captain Bligh trigger a mutiny led by officer Fletcher Christian.
On their way to a sailing trip, an aging husband and wife invite along an emphatic young hitchhiker out of sheer patronization.
An ex-union soldier is hired to transport gold from a mining community through dangerous territory. But what he doesn't realize is that his partner and old friend is plotting to double-cross him.
A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.
An aging widower arranges a marriage for his only daughter.
An impulsive braggart takes a shy law student for a two-day ride through the Roman and Tuscany countries.
A rich businessman and a young woman are attracted to each other, but he only wants an affair while she wants to save herself for marriage.
Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

naslov: Vivre sa vie: Film en douze tableaux
opis: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

naslov: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
opis: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.
The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.
A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.
A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.
